title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP reacts to the Celtics trade offer for Kevin Durant. Is KD worth breaking up a team fresh off finishing runner up in the NBA Finals. Peter King joins us as NFL Training Camps open. How will Devante Adams adapt in Las Vegas? Will Jimmy G be moved before the start of the season? And Charles Barkley calls in to discuss the possibility of taking a deal with the LIV Golf Tour. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
